tool.name: Make VIPER Report
tool.help:
Usage: viper_report.r [options]
Options: -o OUTPUT, --output=OUTPUT Path to output file, saved as PNG.
-a ACTIVITY, --activity=ACTIVITY Path to VIPER activity output file.
-s SAMPLE, --sample=SAMPLE Name of sample of interest.
-n GENE, --gene=GENE Name of gene of interest.
-h, --help Show this help message and exit
